function.name: getobject
function.description: Returns a database row as a list object. Selects from database table table, based on any columns that have been set in object. The optional parameter connectionstring is a string identifying the database connection as returned by the database function. If no connection is given then the last used database connection will be used.

example.description: Query a metadata table based on pageid (primary key), change the value of a field and store it again:
